channel.title: asking for info
channel.description: i am a journalist and i want to use whonix os to secure my self from from gov. Can any body tell me how to use whonix to make it ultra secure for me. I don't know much about computers so can anybody explain me step by step to make it secure

item.title: asking for info
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
On Utilize Search Engines and Documentation we’re putting it this way:

Developers have made significant efforts to configure safe defaults, but operational security (opsec) is not realized by merely using a suitable platform. Staying safe requires a change of mindset and necessary skills are normally developed via trial and effort, experimentation, and general education.

Computing security and anonymity are complex subjects, which means it is improbable that volunteers can assist with every step of the journey and learning curve.

Read full topic

item.title: asking for info
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
It is highly unlikely to find an online volunteer teacher.

The best that we have is this:

Whonix – 27 Jan 22

Whonix ™ Documentation

A Crash Course in Anonymity and Security on the Internet.

Read full topic
